titleStmt.title: The compleat gard'ner, or, Directions for cultivating and right ordering of fruit-gardens and kitchen-gardens with divers reflections on several parts of husbandry, in six books : to which is added, his treatise of orange-trees, with the raising of melons, omitted in the French editions / by the famous Monsr De La Quintinye ... ; made English by John Evelyn ... ; illustrated with copper plates.
Instruction pour les jardins fruitiers et potagers. English
titleStmt.author: La Quintinie, Jean de, 1626-1688.
Evelyn, John, 1620-1706.

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Instructions pour les jardins fruitiers et potagers.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
